name: Performance Food Group Company
description: Performance Food Group Company (PFGC) is a leading foodservice distribution company in the United States, specializing in providing a wide range of food and related products to customers across the foodservice industry. Established in 1885 and headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, PFGC operates through a network of distribution centers and local sales teams, ensuring timely delivery of quality products to restaurants, schools, healthcare facilities, and other foodservice operations. The company offers over 150,000 food and non-food products, including fresh meats, seafood, frozen foods, dairy, dry goods, and cleaning supplies. PFGC is committed to supporting its customers with exceptional service, culinary expertise, and innovative solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of the foodservice sector. With a focus on sustainability and responsible sourcing, Performance Food Group is dedicated to providing high-quality products while minimizing environmental impact. The company continues to expand its footprint through strategic acquisitions and investments, aiming to enhance its distribution capabilities and product offerings. PFGC is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for foodservice distribution as the industry evolves and adapts to changing consumer preferences.

seo.meta_description: Explore Performance Food Group Company, a top foodservice distribution leader offering a vast array of food products and services tailored to the foodservice industry.

faq.question: What types of products does PFGC offer?
faq.answer: PFGC offers food products such as fresh meats, seafood, frozen foods, dairy, and dry goods, as well as non-food items like cleaning supplies.

faq.answer: Performance Food Group was founded in 1885.
